qas.question: Quick development of what kind of browsers led to non-standard HTML dialects?
Modern browser support standards-based and defacto what?
HTML and XHTML should be what by all browsers?

plausible_answers.text: a very simple version of HTML
the development of non-standard dialects of HTML

qas.question: What did the rapid development of modern web browsers lead to?
What problems arose after the development of modern web browsers?
How should non-standard dialects be treated by all browsers?

plausible_answers.text: a combination of standards-based and de facto HTML and XHTML

qas.question: What are two things that a simple HTML version supports?

context: Chỉ hỗ trợ trình duyệt web sớm <b4_0> một phiên bản HTML rất đơn giản <b4_0/> .
